content: melt the ice blender patch/keychain this pattern includes a tapestry grid and a link to a stitchfiddle grid only materials use any yarn type i recommend a blue and green that are very different values to add contrast - teal - light blue - white - grey - black/charcoal 4mm hook or appropriate size for your yarn scissors cutout ice blender tapestry grid view the stitchfiddle com version of the design here https //www stitchfiddle com/c/sgie1x-hegsor © zosha adam a purple house for personal use only do not copy alter or sell you may sell finished items giving credit to a purple house as the designer bonus f ice blender cutout tapestry grid view the stitchfiddle com version of the design here https //www stitchfiddle com/c/sgk61n-aexpo3 finish as a keychain by adding a hook at the top and backing with felt or sewing 2 tapestries back to back © zosha adam a purple house for personal use only do not copy alter or sell you may sell finished items giving credit to a purple house as the designer
